name: ConceptMapR5EndpointElementsForR4Endpoint
title: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4
description: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.

target.comment:
FHIR R5 Resource `Endpoint` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Endpoint`.
Element `Endpoint` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Endpoint.payload.type` has a context of Endpoint based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Endpoint`.
